General.Name: Patriot Energy Corporation
General.Description: Patriot Energy Corporation, through its subsidiary, TelTeck Solutions, designs and develops telematic products. It offers WAMS, a water alarm monitoring system, which is sued for the prevention of unnecessary loss of drinkable water. The company also distributes dual H2O engine oxygenators and tri-brid engine technologies. Patriot Energy Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 6020 Jean-Talon Est, Montreal, QC, Canada, H1S 3B1
